attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Don't authorize a badger cull.This won't help the TB among cattle and will only help to destroy our wildlife .So many people try so hard to keep our beautiful and diverse wildlife to thrive.We won't cull dogs and cats for all the diseases they carry and transmit ,to my eyes every animal have the same right ,as long as they don't pause a serious threat to human health (foot and mouth etc ..)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
